Frostbite

A frontend for Dragonrealms MUD

1 Introduction

Frostbite project first started in the beginning of 2012. The main goal was to create a simple GUI with basic functionality that supports flexible Ruby based scripting and has multi-platform support. It was inspired mostly by the Wizard client but is based on Stormfront down to it's very core.


The Frostbite project is based on open source technologies and special thanks go out to various open source communities for making everything possible.

  • Qt framework - the core framework for building the client software;
  • Ruby - scripting support for the frontend;
  • Github - project related file and source code hosting;
  • OpenGameArt.org - the design elements for the user interface, provided by many artists of which special thanks go out to Ravenmore and Dakal for their generous contribution to the entire open game development community;

The client is still a work in progress and does not provide a full support for all the functions in the game -- it has to be used with caution accordingly.

https://github.com/matoom/frostbite
